metadata.title: CVE-2022-2415 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in WebGL in Google Chrome prior to 103.0.5060.53allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
